mapper.update: update bake_circle set time = #{time,jdbcType=DATE}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resources = #{resources,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, praise = #{praise,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comments = #{comments,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where circle_id = #{circleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select circle_id, time, description, resources, praise, comments from bake_circle
